name: Tire Retreading and Repair Shops
tcc: R for face-to-face transactions.\nT for nonâ€“face-to-face transactions.
description:
This MCC identifies merchants that sell, install, repair, or retread old
tires.
For merchants that provide other types of automotive repair
services, use MCC 7538.
For merchants that primarily sell new automotive tires, use MCC
5532.
